recipes.label: A Conversation with Mr Agdistis
recipes.startdescription: 'How do you do, Librarian. I crave your assistance.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with the Aleppine
recipes.startdescription: 'Peace be with you. I ask entry to the House.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Lieutenant Moore
recipes.startdescription: 'Good day to you. May I come in?' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Dr Peel
recipes.startdescription: 'The day, the night, and here we are again in the day. Marvellous.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with a Friendly Aunt
recipes.startdescription: 'You don't need to invite me in, dear. Someone else already has...' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Azita Bukhara
recipes.startdescription: 'Hello, Librarian. I have questions; I'll pay for answers.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Lalla Chaima
recipes.startdescription: 'There are things I need to know.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with MCO Connie Lee
recipes.startdescription: 'Librarian. I'm here on Bureau business.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with a Princess
recipes.startdescription: 'Darling, hello! I have the teeniest favour to ask...' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Se√±or Corso
recipes.startdescription: 'I don't need an appointment, do I?' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Dagmar
recipes.startdescription: 'Hello, dear. Only me, I'm afraid!' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with a Very Tired Detective
recipes.startdescription: 'All right?' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Ehsan Fekri
recipes.startdescription: 'It's good to be back. Thank you for seeing me.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Lord Franklin Bancroft
recipes.startdescription: '...thorough weather for this time of year. Definite weather...' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Fraser Strathcoyne
recipes.startdescription: 'Librarian. I have urgent business with you.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Magister Hokobald
recipes.startdescription: 'And this is what you call summer?? Pathetic. Don't make me stand around out here.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Magister Hokobald
recipes.startdescription: 'What a grim and chilly little country. I hope you've prepared a suitable welcome.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Julian Coseley
recipes.startdescription: '...if Solomon is gone...if Solomon remains...' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Mlle Matutine
recipes.startdescription: 'Perhaps I should call myself 'Saphir', hein?' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Mme Bechet
recipes.startdescription: 'The pleasure is all mine, Librarian.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Rowena
recipes.startdescription: 'I am here... probably.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Dr Blackwood
recipes.startdescription: 'It's always so very strange to be back. Thank you again for taking on the place.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Father Stanislav
recipes.startdescription: 'Bless you; and bless the House you serve.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Yvette
recipes.startdescription: 'Hello there. Got a moment?' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]

recipes.label: A Conversation with Wakefield
recipes.startdescription: 'Librarian. I can see you.' [If there's an Incident card active, you can discuss it - or just leave the slot empty and offer a Consultation.]
